name: Break-Down
description:
This game is planted to be played by students and teachers. The students will be able to learn how a server works as they will be able to see it and how to find out the IP of their computer, all while having a great time.

Break-Down controls are very simple: 

  •  WASD to move 
  •  Space bar to jump.

To be able to play, two things will be necessary: 

  1. Be at least 2 players 
  2. All players must be connected to the same wifi.

In order to connect to the server you must find out the IPv4 of the computer where the server is hosted.

When 2 players are connected, a game start button will appear on the server, if you click the button, it will start a countdown and then all players can play. While playing you will have two buttons:

  1.  Restart the game 
  2. Close the server.

Good luck!
